name: ULTRABOOST LIGHT SHOES
description: Celebrate Earth Day by taking a long loop in these adidas running shoes. Light BOOST puts an extra spring in your step. The PRIMEKNIT+FORGED upper adapts to the changing shape of your foot as you run. Embroidered leaves and flowers send the message that small changes can make a big difference. This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: SUPERNOVA EARTH DAY SHOES
description: Cultivate change one step at a time in these adidas running shoes. Lightweight Dreamstrike+ cushioning offers comfort and support for runs of any distance. An Adiwear outsole offers dependable traction and stands up to daily wear. Embroidered leaves and flowers on the upper pay homage to Earth Day. By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 20% total of these materials.

name: STAN SMITH SHOES
description: These adidas Stan Smith shoes continue the legacy of their iconic name. Soft leather uppers, 3-Stripes are shaped like tiny holes, and Ecotex tongues offer a familiar look with premium sensations. Gold foil branding and gum rubber outsole blend a football-inspired feel to bring out a new classic design. Like Stan Smith, this shoe made a lasting impact and continued to shape culture 50 years later. This is evidence of the creation of legends.

name: STAN SMITH X BAPE SHOES
description: Whether centre court or city streets, adidas Stan Smith shoes were made to conquer. The latest collaboration between adidas Originals and iconic streetwear brand BAPE takes the classic silhouette to new heights to honour the 30th anniversary of BAPE. These limited-edition kicks are loud and proud, pairing a flexible upper with a stylised camo print that blends in and stands out all at the same time. Built on the same durable rubber outsole that's graced courts for decades, this version is retooled for modern adventures, with a textile lining and perforated 3-Stripes to match the energy of life today. Two sets of laces let you play around with the look. This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: SAMBA AND SHOES
description: THE CLASSIC LOOK AND FEEL OF AUTHENTIC SAMBA.Created for indoor football, Samba is a timeless street style icon. The shoe retains its heritage with a soft leather upper and suede overlay.

name: CRAZY IIINFINITY SHOES
description: Inspired by the iconic Crazy 1, these adidas shoes blend sports heritage with modern street style. The moulded polyurethane upper with mesh shroud and rubber outsole are designed for all-day comfort, style and durability. Step into the new age of adidas lifestyle footwear and explore the city in retro-futuristic kicks made to turn heads.

name: BYW SELECT LOW TRAINERS
description: These low-profile basketball shoes from adidas provide elevated comfort and style to your on-court look. With an energy-returning BOOST midsole, every step toward the rack is super charged. The textile upper is durable so you can wear these shoes all season long, while the rubber outsole keeps your grip secure for much-needed support.

name: RUNNING SWITCH RUN SHOES
description: Combining style with distraction-free details, the latest product line from your favorite adidas running will keep you looking as good as your mood while running. So, you can focus on what matters most: enjoying each step. Put on Running Switch Run Shoes and step rhythmically with ease. This shoe is designed for a lightweight fit and features an Adiwear outsole and 3D heel counter for stability. The mesh soft upper and lining ensure the ultimate comfort as you step. Made from a range of recycled materials, the upper contains at least 50% recycled content.

name: ULTRABOOST LIGHT SHOES
description: Unlock your best self in these adidas running shoes, designed to energise your run no matter the speed or distance. The adidas Light BOOST midsole cushioning is the lightest adidas BOOST ever, with even more energy return with each push-off. The PRIMEKNIT+FORGED upper contours to your foot for a precision fit with midfoot support. Natural mineral textures on the upper remind you to take your run outside and engage your senses. This product has been made with at least 20% renewable materials. Switching to renewable material sources offers more options to reduce our reliance on finite resources. We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be planted and grown?again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish. Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock instead of fossil fuel. With an energy-returning BOOST midsole, every step toward the rack is super charged. The textile upper is durable so you can wear these shoes all season long, while the rubber outsole keeps your grip secure for much-needed support.

name: SUPERNOVA RISE EARTH DAY SHOES
description: In honour of Earth Day and inspired by the radical gardening movement, these adidas running shoes serve as a reminder that micro actions can make big changes. Embroidered florals bloom across the breathable mesh upper. The Dreamstrike+ midsole ensures your daily run is as comfortable as it is meaningful. By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 20% total of these materials.

name: DAME 8 EXTPLY SHOES
description: Never shy away from your practice. With the latest signature shoes from Damian Lillard and adidas Basketball, you don't have to worry. Designed for exceptional durability, the Dame 8 EXTPLY features a dynamic Bounce midsole that combines greater stability with lightweight, flexible cushioning. The construction of the inside socks and TPU-made propulsion plates keep you focused and moving with confidence, as you spend time in the gym practicing long-range shots or hitting the winning shots like one of the game's best go-toes.

name: DROPSET SHOES 2
description: The sensation of a barbell in your hand, a plate rubbing against each other, a bell ring of personal records. Nothing beats a great weightlifting moment, and these adidas workout shoes deliver an outstanding performance during Strength Training sessions. The 6 mm drop midsole provides a flat, stable platform and helps you find the right alignment in all movements. The dual-density midsole provides controlled comfort and stability, and the grip-powered Traxion keeps your footing solid. Made from a range of recycled materials, the upper contains at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste pollution.

name: FALCON GALAXY SHOES
description: Inspired by iconic 2000s runners, these adidas Falcon Galaxy shoes keep your style on point. A fresh take on 3-Stripes gives them new attitude. The mesh and suede upper pairs retro inspiration with a modern shape. A re-proportioned EVA midsole and TPU arch offer support and comfort for all-day wear, and the rubber outsole keeps up with your active lifestyle. Slip them on and fuse sporty style with a hint of nostalgia.

name: SEPATU RUNFALCON 3.0 ELASTIC LACE TOP STRAP
description: When your little one puts in maximum effort on the track, make sure they have shoes that will keep up with their enthusiasm and energy. These adidas shoes for kids have a soft Cloudfoam midsole that provides comfort to children, ensuring every landing and lift of the foot is supported. When they have finished practicing, there is no need to change shoes. A classic and sporty look that goes well with any outfit. One more thing not to worry about. Made from a range of recycled materials, the upper contains at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste pollution.

name: STAR WARS RUNNER SHOES KIDS
description: The Force is strong with these sneakers. Little Padawans will want to use their lightning-quick reflexes to get into these comfortable adidas Star Wars Runner shoes. Stretchy elastic laces and a hook-and-loop strap make them easy to put on and secure, while Star Wars colours and 3D graphics transport kids to a galaxy far, far away. This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: ALTAVENTURE 2.0 SHOES KIDS
description: Play outside in these quick-drying adidas Altaventure sandals. With feet free to breathe in the airy mesh upper and hook-and-loop straps to secure the fit, little adventurers will be ready to splash through creeks or scale playground equipment. The EVA footbed keeps each step soft while the rubber outsole with protective toe guard allows kids to traverse all types of terrain without worry. Whether building sandcastles or conquering the monkey bars, these sandals are built for summer fun.

name: ADIZERO BOUNCE SELECT 2.0 LOW BASKETBALL SHOES
description: Blow past your opponents with quickness and ease in these Adizero basketball shoes. Ultralight Lightstrike cushions your explosive moves on the hardwood while Bounce provides instant step-in comfort and flexibility with every stride. These basketball shoes are built for players who thrive on speed and change of direction. The lightweight textile upper and breathable mesh lining keep you quick on your feet from warmups through the final buzzer.

name: TOUR360 BOA 24 BOOST WIDE GOLF SHOES
description: Feel your best. Play your best. Confidence and style come naturally in the adidas Tour360 BOA 24 BOOST Golf Shoes. Made for tournament play and dedicated golfers, they wrap your feet in premium materials and feature leading-edge footwear technology for elite-level performance. The micro-adjustable BOAÂ® Fit System activates the internal 360Wrap for enhanced hold and support. A combination of adidas Lightstrike cushioning and JET BOOST in the heel complement a Torsion Bridge stabiliser to energise every step and stabilises every stance for powerful drives. The waterproof microfibre leather upper supports your foot for comfort through full-round play. Elevate your game with golf shoes that let you look and feel your best. By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials

name: GAZELLE SHOES
description: Once relegated to training, the adidas Gazelle shoes have transformed into an icon. Slip into the low-cut profile and experience what made this shoe a legend. A synthetic upper provides a sleek silhouette, while the textile lining keeps things comfortable inside. Whether heading to the park or grabbing coffee with friends, the rubber outsole offers grip for all your moves. Linking generations through a shared commitment to style and excellence, these shoes continue the adidas tradition of timeless design.
